meanings.sent1: The califs ruled the kingdom with wisdom and grace.
meanings.sent2: The califs gathered to discuss important matters in the palace.
meanings.sent3: The califs decided to have a picnic in the royal garden.
meanings.sent4: The califs stood tall like ancient trees in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The califs wore majestic robes embroidered with gold threads.

meanings.definition: califs: third person singular present of calif
meanings.sent1: She califs every morning before starting her day.
meanings.sent2: He califs with enthusiasm whenever he speaks about his dreams.
meanings.sent3: The cat califs loudly when it wants attention.
meanings.sent4: The engine califs softly as the car comes to a stop.
meanings.sent5: The kettle califs as it reaches boiling point.
